review: My kid was suffering from very high fever with pain in stomach from last one week. Since, there was no improvement from existing physician medicines we decided to go for other doctor. After recommendation of my friend, we visited Dr. Amit and after examining the child Dr. Amit explained the reason and time by which child would start showing improvements. I can honestly say that after meeting with Dr. Amit we were very much satisfied that he is a knowledgeable and professional doctor as all his prediction about my child went correct. My child has started showing improvements and I really wants to say big thanks to Dr. Amit for his help during our most difficult times.

I am visting him for last 3 year for treatment of my son who is suffering from nephrotic syndrome.  
He is a very fine and humble person.  Explaind all the matter related to this treatment and i think he is the best doctor related to nephrotic syndrome.

It was nice experience with Dr amit.he is quite knowledgeable and attended us well.he had examined my child properly n dn diagnosed well.the medication regimen was quite effective.along with this his communication skills were very excellent,his way of approach to the client is very nice.I would personally recommend my all known to.s to visit him in case of emergency.he's a very nice personality as well as a very good Dr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Wonderfull experiance with the doctor he explained everything about the disease. And he replayed to all queries very patiently.

He is an awesome doctor who gives enough time to listen to concerns and provide solution.
Thanks doctor
